title: Catherine Zeta-Jones
summary: Catherine Zeta-Jones CBE (/ˈziːtə/; born 25 September 1969)[lower-alpha 1] is a Welsh actress. She is the recipient of several accolades, including an Academy Award, BAFTA Award, Tony Award and three awards from the Screen Actors Guild. In 2010, she was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) for her film and humanitarian work.
